1.0.name: wordpress/simplest-colorbox
1.0.description: This plugin is intended as an easy to use alternative to other lightbox/Colorbox alternatives. Unlike most other plugins with similar functionality, this one does not have any settings or requirements whatsoever. "Simplest Colorbox" in contrast to simple "Simple Colorbox" also doesn't uses any transition effects.
